name: Couch Simulator 2022
description:
Couch Simulator 2022 allows you to experience what it's like to sit on a couch! There is only 1 couch.

INCLUDES CHAIR DLC!!!

Get ready for Couch Simulator 2023, featuring 1 more couch for the standard price of $70

Controls:

WASD - Move

Mouse - Look

Control - Lie down

Lshift - Run

#couch Couch Simulator 2022 is a small joke project that I worked on last year, Now on itch.io!
